Text:
Lovely quality, thanks a lot for the up!

It's not 1080p though, but rather 812p to be exact.  Not that it matters to me, just thought I'd mention it in case it matters to someone else.

There are no subtitles included in this download. The language is in English however there are parts of this movie that are in a different language. Downloaded an .srt off the net and even that didn't include the subs for the non English parts of the movie. Kind of weak to download for two weeks and feel like I only saw half the movie.....Unless I am missing something your info is wrong. A-10, V-10 still upset a bit but thanks for the upload.

No subs for the gaelic speaking parts , which you need for this movie.

Someone, like the uploader, needs to get the DVDr version, and copy / edit the subs over for the HD version.

Totally worth it for a movie this good and beautiful.
